column4: aTypical-> you can use that, then you can use debootstrap to load the newer..and pkagaes after..i dont suggest upgrading, people had difficulty time with upgrades..dont know why
most such difficulties arise from modifications of the gutsy install. A freshly installed gutsy will upgrade cleanly
aTypical-> just an fyi, a debootstrap installs the base, then installing the packages to complete it
oh okay cool..i guess off the bat people tend to do an update that modifies and then do an upgrade..
